patthana23.15:1.1_0: Nakusalaṁ namaggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā kusalo maggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.15:2.1_0: Nakusalaṁ namaggahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā kusalo maggahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.15:3.1_0: Nakusalaṁ namaggādhipatiṁ dhammaṁ paccayā kusalo maggādhipati dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
